long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helper for Meteora Pools This extension is designed to help you save time if you use DLMM pools on Meteora. It provides several helpful features:

Removes DYM pools from the pool table on DEXscreener (see picture 1).
When you open a token, it displays all Meteora current pools, including links with basic information about each pool (see picture 2).
On the Meteora DLMM pools page, it shows the cost of your position converted to Solana, the cost of trade fees converted to Solana, and the total value converted to Solana (see picture 3).
